original_text: The first chariot had red horses and the second chariot had black horses.
korean_text: 첫째 병거는 붉은 말들이, 둘째 병거는 검은 말들이,

sentences.original_text: The first chariot had red horses
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 번째 전차는 붉은 말들을 가지고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and the second chariot had black horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두 번째 전차는 검은 말들을 가지고 있었다
